name: Cotton, whole plant, at field
description:
Agricultural Crop Production, Harvested acres are 84% of the planted acres (1998-2000 US average).
The impacts of producing 1 kg of seed are assumed equal to those of producing 1kg of lint.
For Water, only consumptive use is taken into account (i.e. 60.7% of the total water consumption).
Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has 
undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet 
undergone a formal validation process.
Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.

sources.name: National Center for Food and Agricultura
